result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُواْ فِي ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا ظُلِمُواْ لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗۖ وَلَأَجۡرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: 41. Yallih sabbatah sinni baaxo cabeeh guurume mari yundullumek lakal, diggah addunyal meqe madabal (Madiina kinnuk) dabqah ken heenno, akeeral usun Ion galto (jannat kinnuk) wohuk nabuk raqta sinam woh aaxaguk suginnay.
